verses.text: I will thank you, O Lord, with all my heart: in the sight of the gods I will sing your praise,
and prostrate before your holy temple, will praise your name for your constant love, for you have exulted your promise above all.
When I called you, you answered; you gave me strength, you inspired me.
All the kings of the earth shall praise you, O \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, when they shall have heard the words you have uttered;
and they shall sing of the ways of the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, and tell of the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*â€™s transcendent glory.
For, high though the \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*is, he looks on the lowly, and strikes down the haughty from far away.
Though my way be distressful, yet you preserve me: you lay your hand on my angry foes, and your right hand gives me victory.
The \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*will accomplish all that which concerns me. Your kindness, O \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*, endures forever. O do not abandon the work of your hands.
